Summary: 35 mm exposure of an alien like being.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife encountered a bright light at night. She was going outside to remove cloths from cloths line, when she saw the bright light just hovering above a tree. The tree was in the back yard, about 15 feet away from her. She went back into the garage and took the 35 mm camera from the car. All she could see was a bright light. The photo shows the result of the bright light. The second photo was taken inside the garage, May 2006. She also heard a loud noise in the garage, while inside the house. She could see a dim light just floating up in a corner of the walls in the garage. The garage was lit up by this light. The results of the dim light is shown in the picture.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Deming
There were no other sightings in Deming on or around June 1st 2009
